name: Gunship Sequel: WW2
description:
Gunship Sequel WW2 (previously known as Wings of Duty) brings realistic combat flight simulation experience to mobile platforms with 360 degrees detail-realistic cockpits, carrier operations, multi-player battles, arcade/historic/realistic modes and more.

Features Midway, Pearl Harbor, Guadalcanal and New Guinea map, and the new Europe theater.

Tanks are now available for battles.
